thread.title: Nebraska Book Holdings, Inc. Announces Extension of Financial Reporting Deadlines
thread.title_full: Nebraska Book Holdings, Inc. Announces Extension of Financial Reporting Deadlines

title: Nebraska Book Holdings, Inc. Announces Extension of Financial Reporting Deadlines
text:
Nebraska Book Holdings, Inc. Announces Extension of Financial Reporting Deadlines September 30, 2015 06:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time 
LINCOLN, Neb.--( BUSINESS WIRE )--Nebraska Book Holdings, Inc. (the “Company”) (OTC Pink: NEEB) today announced that a majority of the holders of its senior secured notes have agreed to extend the deadline for delivery of the Company’s fiscal year 2015 audited financial statements to December 31, 2015. In addition, the Company received an extension of the deadline for its first and second quarter fiscal 2016 unaudited financials to December 31, 2015. The Company requested these extensions due to the complexities of the sale of its retail division in June 2015. 
“The sale of our retail division included a significant number of detailed financial components, from stores to personnel,” said Ben Riggsby, interim president and chief executive officer for Nebraska Book Company. “The complexity of these financial actions require additional time to process and report accurately and completely.” 
About Nebraska Book Company Nebraska Book Company, which began in 1915 with an independent college bookstore, now represents a key textbook resource with strategic business services and technology partner to strengthen independent college retailers across the United States. Nebraska Book Company currently supports more than 2,000 independent college retailers with literally millions of textbooks nationwide, localized e-commerce capabilities and back-end system access and support. For more information about Nebraska Book Company, visit www.nebook.com .*Nebraska Book Holdings, Inc. common stock is not listed or traded on any U.S. stock exchange but is quoted on the OTC Pink Market under the symbol NEEB. Contacts 
Carrie McKenzie-Bush, 402-421-7300 Release Summary 
Nebraska Book Holdings, Inc. announces a deadline extension for fiscal year 2015 audited financial statements and its first and second quarter fiscal 2016 unaudited financials. Sharing
